description:
Hinaichi follows Draluc around to see if she can figure out his secret, and Ronaldo introduces Draluc to the Hunters Guild.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Carambolage sur l`autoroute du succès / La joyeuse guilde des chasseurs imbéciles / La joyeuse guilde (rebelotte)
Highway to Success, Path to Failure / Ridiculous Hunter Guild / More Ridiculous Hunter Guild
Shussekaidou Tenraku Dou / Bakasawagi Taiji Hito Guild / Mada Bakasawagi Taiji Hito Guild
出世街道転落道 / バカ騒ぎ退治人ギルド / まだバカ騒ぎ退治人ギルド
